feed.title: Budget Board Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.1.4
entry.content:
Fixed a bug with the category select input not displaying custom categories under their respective parent.

What's Changed

  • Fix category select input order by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.1.3...v2.1.4

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.1.5
entry.content:
Fixed a few UI bugs that were showing up in Chromium based browsers (e.g. Chrome, Edge, etc.)

What's Changed

  • Various UI fixes by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/404
  • More styling fixes by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/405

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.1.2...v2.1.5

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.1.6
entry.content:
Fixed some inconsistency with the color of the budgets when they reached $0 left

What's Changed

  • Make budget colors consistent with display value by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/406

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.1.2...v2.1.6

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.1.7
entry.content:
Updated react-router to fix a vulnerability, and fixed a minor issue with simpleFIN accounts when they sync the first time.

What's Changed

  • Bump react-router from 7.5.0 to 7.5.2 in /client by @dependabot in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/421
  • Fix synced accounts to keep source by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/425

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.1.2...v2.1.7

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.1.8
entry.content:
Removed requirement for account names to be unique to resolve an issue with simpleFIN sync

What's Changed

  • Remove requirement for unique account names by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.1.2...v2.1.8
